Uses of Player in handlers
 

Methods in handlers with parameters of type Player
 boolean PlayerEventsHandler.onCardAdded(Player target, Player byWhom, Card card)
          called AFTER a card was given to "target" player
 boolean PublicEventsHandler.onCardAdded(Public publicZone, Player player, Card card)
          called AFTER given card was added to given public zone, use public.peek() to see first card in that public before given card was added, and use public.first() to see first card in that public at the current state (AFTER given card was added to that public)
 boolean PlayerEventsHandler.onCardRemoved(Player player, Card card)
          called BEFORE given card was removed from given player
 boolean PublicEventsHandler.onCardRemoved(Public publicZone, Player player, Card card)
          called BEFORE given card was removed from given public zone by given player
 boolean PlayerEventsHandler.onCardRevealed(Player player, Card card)
          Deprecated. called after card was revealed
 boolean PublicEventsHandler.onCardRevealed(Public publicZone, Player player, Card card)
          called AFTER given card was revealed by given player (null if logic) that is in given public zone
 boolean PlayerEventsHandler.onMyTurn(Player player)
          called after player got his turn
 boolean PlayerEventsHandler.onRoundEnd(Player player)
          called after user used player.endRound()
 boolean PublicEventsHandler.onRoundEnd(Public publicZone, Player player)
          called after public.endRound() was activated by given player (given player ended the round), null if logic did it
 boolean PlayerEventsHandler.onTurnEnd(Player player)
          called after user used player.endTurn()
